title: (x) Odd but beautiful italic serif "selling false" - Freight Big/Display {Marc O}
content:
Oh great identifiers of type, what is the name of this font?

Thanks in advance,  
Tim

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018070744/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_151.png) | 117.3 KB |
author: belonax

comments.content: Freight Display Italic (or Freight Big Italic)
You're welcome. I have the pleasure of using Freight (for text and display) in one of the magazines I design. It's beautiful.

\> _Oh great identifiers of type, what is the name of this font?_

Whoa! Now we're being addressed like we're deities. How cool is that? :^D
